content.content: Tool House Rock #3 | Common Ground      Join us on Tuesday 14-Mar for another session of Tool House Rock! For this episode, we will host the founders and designer from Common Ground to explore this project’s solution for a unified and web3-native platform for communities to interact with each other.  Problem Space Communication within DAOs can be a challenge. Orchestrating a communication strategy across web2 and web3 tools while respecting roles and responsibilities within a community is a growing problem space for a growing DAO. Ensuring an open and transparent communication strategy, that is securely built and owned by the community is the problem space Common Ground addresses.  What is Common Ground? Common Ground is an application that fosters the integration and communication of users in the web3 space. Common Ground provides an all-in-one platform to give decentralized organizations:  Admins and mods End-to-end encrypted DMs and voice chats Layer 2 to token-gate or airdrop Ability to issue quests and reward your community Track your community’s growth Warn, mute, ban unruly people with ease A community wiki with content in one place   Our guests are…  Common Ground’s Founder & Legal - Florian  Common Ground’s Founder and CTO - Jan  Common Ground’s Designer - Dominic    Session hosted by…  @Retro @Juan   Join Us! If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guest on this post, and our hosts will ask them during the Q&A.  Agenda  Introduction of the problem space Product solution Demonstration Relevancy with Endgame Q&A   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2023-03-14T16:00:00Z Add the call to your calendar  Where Zoom Link  here Attn: @Core-Facilitators, @Recognized-Delegates
